original_title: Polka Dot Superstar: The Amazing World of Yayoi Kusama
overview: This film follows Yayoi Kusama during the preparations for Tate Modern's 2012 retrospective of her work, when she undertook the mammoth physical and mental challenge of creating 100 new works for the largest-ever exhibition of her art.
title: Polka Dot Superstar: The Amazing World of Yayoi Kusama
